SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.light

Class TubeLight

java.lang.Object
net.elena.murat.light.TubeLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Light
public class TubeLight extends Object implements Light
License GPL-3.0 Implements a linear tube light source for fluorescent-like lighting. Emits light along a line segment with soft shadow effects.

  • Constructor Details

    • TubeLight

      public TubeLight(Point3 startPoint, Point3 endPoint, double radius, Color color, double intensity, int sampleCount)
      Constructs a new tube light along a line segment.
      Parameters:
      startPoint - Starting point of the tube
      endPoint - Ending point of the tube
      radius - Radius of the tube
      color - Light color
      intensity - Base intensity value
      sampleCount - Number of samples for soft shadow calculation
